data.eml:eml: A new species of Pseudatrichia Osten Sacken (Diptera: Scenopinidae) from North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Winterton, Shaun L. (2009): A new species of Pseudatrichia Osten Sacken (Diptera: Scenopinidae) from North America. Zootaxa 2094: 36-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187585
